tooltip.owned: Locked by me {{timestamp}}. Click to unlock

downloadModal.title: Lock file?
downloadModal.description: You may lock this file to prevent other users from changing it until you commit your changes. If you do not lock the file you may be unable to commit changes to this file.

downloadLock.tooltip: You may download the file but not commit any changes
downloadLock.label: Download

uploadLockModal.title: Files are locked
uploadLockModal.description: The files you are trying to upload are locked. You can unlock all conflicting files and upload afterwards.

unlockModal.title: File locked by "{{username}}"
unlockModal.description: You are free to unlock this file by yourself, but you should ask the user "{{username}}" first.

enabled.label: Show/Modify file locks via UI
enabled.helpText: File locks can be seen and managed via UI. Disabling this config does not prevent file locks via the native commands.

*.displayName: Modify repository specific file lock configuration
*.description: May modify the repository specific file lock configuration for all repositories

configureFileLock.description: May modify the repository specific file lock configurations
